modName: Request and Random Presets created by kamikazegrunt2
summary: Random Presets that I've created for fun either consisting of characters I've came up with or request made by the community
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]Hello everyone and welcome to kamikazegrunts Preset page![/size][/b]
You can find all my presets on here and can easily download them through your preferred mod manager
[u][size=4]I create presets whenever I have the time so please understand that I do have a busy schedule and I will get to each request when I have the time
[/size][/u][/center][size=3]
[/size][left]﻿[size=3]I'm happy that you've found your way here to my page and have taken the time to view my presets I mainly do this for fun[/size]
[size=3]and it consist of characters I've came up with or special request made by people like you

Now if your wondering how to submit a request here's how!
[list=1]
[*]Go into the comments page and type up a short paragraph of your character
[*]In the paraghaph please type up details on how they look such as hair, eye color, facial details, ect.
[*]If you would rather submit a picture please include a link to said picture
[/list]
Once you've submitted your request I'll reply saying I'll do it
[u][i]please understand I wont do every single request

[/i][/u]One thing to consider when submiting a request please dont ask for sexy anime girls that is probably the only thing I will always say no too
I mainly want to create characters that are badass, hilarious, or Interesting

There are also some requirments to be able to use the presets and to make them look like they do in their pictures[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/]No More Blocky Faces[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/]Beards[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588]Women of Skyrim female textures[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82588/]Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url]﻿ or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?tab=description]Skyrim - Glowing Eyes[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]HDT Physics Extension[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/]aMidianBorn Book of Silence Armors[/url]﻿
[/list]
Heres a list of the armor and clothing I've used in these presets
[/size][size=3][list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82543/]DCR - King Crusader Armor[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51813/]Common Clothes[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85411/]UUNP Vanilla Outfits Bodyslides[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31002]Insanitys Shields[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5315]Bucklers - Shields and Other Armor[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15927/]Improved closefaced helmets[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33787]Rayban-like Sunglasses[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59700/]Capes with HDT physics[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72581/?tab=files&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D72581&pUp=1]Illustrious HDT Cloaks[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19644/]Blue Jeans Plus Volume 3[/url]﻿
[/list]Hopefully you guys will enjoy what I end up creating and if you have any problems please let me know right away!
~kamikazegrunt2[/size][/left]
[size=5]

[/size][b][u][size=5]Also don't steal my work and make money off of it guys I'm warning you before you do it
your welcome to use it in your game and have fun with them just don't be rude that's all I'm asking[/size]
[/u][/b]
author: kamikazegrunt2
